phases.name: Foundation
phases.description: Project setup, dependencies, core data schema, file-based storage engine, sliding window manager, and configuration module.
phases.milestone: Core infrastructure complete: data models defined, storage engine operational, sliding window enforced, configuration loading works.

phases.name: Core MCP Tools
phases.description: FastMCP server bootstrap and all recording tools: record_step, record_decision, record_file, record_branch, task lifecycle management, and markdown summary generation.
phases.milestone: MCP server running with all 6 core recording tools functional and tested. Tasks can be started, recorded, and completed via MCP.

phases.name: Recovery and CLI
phases.description: Recovery context tool for post-/clear resumption, alignment checking tool, and developer-facing Click CLI with status, show, and list commands.
phases.milestone: After /clear, get_recovery_context returns full task context. Developer CLI shows memory status, task details, and task history.

phases.name: Agent Forge Integration
phases.description: Hook integration for automatic recording, pipeline state file readers, post-clear recovery workflow, and end-to-end integration testing.
phases.milestone: Memory recording works automatically during Agent Forge pipeline execution via hooks. Full recovery workflow operational. Integration tests pass.

phases.name: Drift Detection and Intervention
phases.description: Plan drift detection, error loop detection, confusion pattern detection, scope creep detection, and graduated intervention system.
phases.milestone: Drift detection catches error loops (3+ failures) and wrong-file edits. Graduated intervention warns on first detection, suggests auto-clear on second.

phases.name: Enhancement
phases.description: Memory analytics, developer review dashboard, memory export/import, and cross-project memory capabilities.
phases.milestone: Analytics provide actionable insights across tasks. Dashboard gives developers full visibility. Export/import enables context sharing.

tickets.title: Project initialization and structure
tickets.description: Set up the Python project structure with pyproject.toml, dependencies (fastmcp, click, pydantic), directory layout (models, storage, mcp, cli, detection, hooks), entry points, and README.

tickets.title: Memory data schema and models
tickets.description: Define Pydantic data models: TaskMemory, StepRecord, FileRecord, BranchRecord, DecisionRecord, RecoveryContext, MemoryWindow. All with JSON serialization and validation.

tickets.title: File-based storage engine
tickets.description: Implement MemoryStore class with save/load/list/delete task methods, atomic writes, .claude-memory/ directory management, and window state persistence.

tickets.title: Sliding window retention manager
tickets.description: Implement WindowManager class enforcing 3+current sliding window with complete_current_task, start_new_task, archival of oldest tasks, and edge case handling.

tickets.title: Configuration and settings module
tickets.description: Create MemoryConfig class with storage_path, window_size, log_level settings. Load from config.json, auto-detect project root, environment variable overrides.

tickets.title: FastMCP server bootstrap
tickets.description: Set up FastMCP server instance with stdio transport, MemoryStore and WindowManager integration, error handling, health check, and startup logging.

tickets.title: record_step and record_decision MCP tools
tickets.description: Implement record_step (action, description, tool_used, result_summary) and record_decision (decision, reasoning, alternatives, context) MCP tools with auto-numbering and timestamps.

tickets.title: record_file and record_branch MCP tools
tickets.description: Implement record_file (path, action, description) and record_branch (branch_name, action, base_branch) MCP tools with deduplication and lifecycle tracking.

tickets.title: Task lifecycle management
tickets.description: Implement start_task, complete_task, and get_task_status MCP tools. Coordinate with WindowManager for window rotation on task completion.

tickets.title: Markdown summary generation
tickets.description: Implement MarkdownGenerator that creates human-readable .md summaries for completed tasks and maintains a current-summary.md for active tasks.

tickets.title: get_recovery_context MCP tool
tickets.description: Implement get_recovery_context tool returning full task context after /clear: ticket ID, phase, last step, files modified, active branch, key decisions, next steps, recent steps.

tickets.title: check_alignment MCP tool
tickets.description: Implement check_alignment tool that compares current action against task scope, returning alignment report with confidence score, warnings, and scope info.

tickets.title: Click CLI framework and memory status command
tickets.description: Set up Click CLI group with entry point. Implement memory status command showing current task, window state, storage info, and last activity.

tickets.title: CLI memory show and memory list commands
tickets.description: Implement memory list (table of tasks in window, --all, --format json) and memory show <ticket-id> (full task details, timeline, decisions) commands.

tickets.title: Agent Forge hook integration for automatic recording
tickets.description: Implement hooks module with post_tool_call, post_build_start, post_build_complete, and post_merge hooks for transparent automatic memory recording during pipeline execution.

tickets.title: Pipeline state file readers
tickets.description: Implement StateReader class that reads Agent Forge state files (pipeline.json, build-output.json, backlog.json, plan-output.json) with caching and graceful error handling.

tickets.title: Post-clear recovery workflow
tickets.description: Implement complete post-/clear recovery workflow: detect clear events, generate recovery prompts, integrate with pipeline resumption, memory recover CLI command.

tickets.title: End-to-end integration testing
tickets.description: Comprehensive integration tests: full lifecycle, sliding window rotation, recovery context accuracy, MCP tool round-trips, CLI output, hook integration, edge cases. All real I/O, no mocks.

tickets.title: Plan drift detection engine
tickets.description: Implement DriftDetector class that compares current actions against task scope using file scope analysis and action relevance scoring. Returns DriftReport with severity.

tickets.title: Error loop detection
tickets.description: Implement ErrorLoopDetector class tracking consecutive failures of the same action. Configurable threshold (default 3). Distinguishes true loops from iterative debugging.

tickets.title: Confusion pattern detection
tickets.description: Implement ConfusionDetector class that flags references to non-existent files, wrong function names, and state contradictions. Uses filesystem checks for verification.

tickets.title: Scope creep detection
tickets.description: Implement ScopeCreepDetector class that defines ticket scope from description/keywords, detects out-of-scope file edits and feature additions. Integrates with DriftDetector.

tickets.title: Graduated intervention system
tickets.description: Implement InterventionManager class with graduated responses: Level 1 warning on first detection, Level 2 auto-clear suggestion on second. Aggregates all detector reports. Debouncing and configurable thresholds.

tickets.title: Memory analytics
tickets.description: Implement MemoryAnalytics class analyzing all tasks for patterns: avg steps/time per ticket, frequently modified files, common errors, decision patterns. CLI command with --json and --since options.

tickets.title: Developer review dashboard
tickets.description: Implement memory dashboard CLI command showing task timeline, decision tree visualization, file modification heat map, intervention summary, and window state.

tickets.title: Memory export and import
tickets.description: Implement memory export (to portable JSON with format version) and memory import (with validation, merge/replace options, compatibility checks) CLI commands.

tickets.title: Cross-project memory
tickets.description: Implement CrossProjectMemory class aggregating data across Agent Forge projects via hub registry. Cross-project analytics, CLI command, global storage in ~/.claude-memory-global/.
